mapper.sql: select a.riqi from ( select curdate() - INTERVAL (a.a + (10 * b.a) + (100 * c.a)) DAY as riqi from ( select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) as a cross join ( select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) as b cross join ( select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) as c ) a where a.riqi between '${beginTime}' and '${endTime}'

SELECT cs.company , cs.VehId, cs.plate, cs.color, cs.schname , cs.SeatNumber, cs.Agroup, cs.riqi, cs.date, CASE WHEN cs2.kaishishijian IS NULL THEN '×' ELSE '√' END count, ifnull( jishu.zongshu, 0 ) zongshu FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT d.company , d.VehId, d.plate, d.color, d.schname , d.SeatNumber, d.Agroup, c.riqi, concat('yy',cast(Month(c.riqi) as char),cast(Day(c.riqi) as char )) AS date from baobiao_gpsfuelveh d, (
)c ) cs left join (SELECT DISTINCT a1.VehId, DATE_FORMAT(a1.starttime,'%y%m%d') AS kaishishijian FROM baobiao_fueltotalreport a1 WHERE a1.endtime IS NOT NULL )cs2 on cs.riqi=cs2.kaishishijian and cs.VehId=cs2.VehId left join (select count(*) zongshu, a.VehId from ( SELECT DISTINCT a.VehId , DATE_FORMAT(a.starttime,'%y%m%d') AS kaishishijian FROM baobiao_fueltotalreport a WHERE a.endtime IS NOT NULL and a.starttime >='${beginTime}' and a.endtime <='${endTime}' )a group by a.VehId )jishu on cs.VehId=jishu.VehId
